ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m pretty sure that a mino horn is a wind instrument. ... horn ... Using ... cha
ygData.messageBody:
I'm pretty sure that a mino horn is a wind instrument.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Amy Pratt [mailto:pratts001@...]
> Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 3:42 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Instruments (was complete heal)
>
> Isn't a mino horn a brass instrument? I saw a bard in my group using a
horn
> last night with pixie strike (I play a chanter now). Am I missing
> something? Isn't pixie strike a wind song? When I used to use it, I used
> my flute until I got a piccolo off that big ugly rockhead in Fear.
>
> Kaelrei
>
>
> > I have very little trouble keeping 2 mobs mezzed with pixie strike.
Using
> a
> > mino horn (Save up for one of these babies!!!!) and with 135 unbuffed
cha
> > (nothing special) I was keeping 2 mobs mezzed in chardok (where the mobs
> are
> > high blue/yellow to me, if a mob was red to me, we were probably killing
> it
> > first).
> >
> > So Pixie is reliable enough to keep 2 mobs mezzed.
